column4: So theres no way to repair an install via the ubuntu cd? without loosing all my data and such :/
well.. my install seems to be damaged. It worked and now its having trouble booting.. I figured there may be a repair feature that checks system files and/or boot sequences and such :S
No, your best bet is to boot on rescue mode and note *where* the boot fails. Then you can use the cd to log in to the install and fix the problem.
